name: {TITLE}
description:
Your life is miserable. You came to New York hoping to become a successful journalist and you are forced to beg your father to send you some money.
But one morning, the homeless woman leaving downstairs dies and it's for you the beginning of a story. Your story.

{TITLE} was written during the Text Jam 2014. It was made with Axure, which is usually used for prototyping but why not?

{TITLE} is in English, with a lot of text and can be finished in less than 15 minutes.
